creator: CRDB BANK PLC
descriptionHtml:
Get CRDB Bank SimBanking App and make your banking experience much easier, convenient and secure. Kwa raha zako!
SimBanking App gives you access to your account and transact when and where you choose in the world, Ulipo Tupo!

SimBanking App allows you to seamlessly manage your financial life with the ability to transfer funds to your own accounts, to other bank accounts and to mobile operators; to borrow funds either as a Personal Loan or Salary Advance; pay personal & family related bills such as LUKU, water, television, school fees etc. and to the government such as taxes, levies, fees and fines; pay for products and services through SimBanking Visa’s Scan to Pay service and many more.

Even non customers can enjoy SimBanking App and use it to get product information, currency exchange rates, Locators for MasterCard, Visa and China Union Pay accepting ATMs and branches, Dar es Salaam Stock Exchange highlights and many more.
SimBanking is available in English and Swahili.

Download and Enjoy!
descriptionShort: SimBanking App from CRDB Bank Plc, the Leading Innovative Bank from East Africa.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-Fixes in Boom Advance and Salary Advance
-Addition of Tigo Super Agent Cash-In and Tigo Trust Cash-In

title: CRDB BANK SimBanking

creator: CRDB BANK PLC
descriptionHtml:
Benki ni Simbanking! Our new CRDB Bank SimBanking App gives you full visibility of your accounts and total control over your money. It’s more secure, simpler and faster! Open a fully KYC account, buy insurance, block or apply for TemboCard. Plus, you can make the App personal by selecting exciting features that suit your personal taste and many more features we think you’ll love…

Simple day-to-day banking

• Open a full KYC account
• Ease payments and transfers including bulk payments
• Buy airtime send money without the need to select the mobile money company
• Easier way to withdraw cash from CRDB ATM or Wakala without a TemboCard
• Pay for your shopping and services conveniently through merchant CRDB Lipa Namba

Take control of your money

• Block your TemboCard
• Get insurance or Insurance premium calculator
• Review you monthly, quarterly or annual statement

Single view of your account

• Single view of all your CRDB Bank accounts
• Manage your loans
• Link your accounts

Safer, smarter banking

• Secure login with your PIN
• Ability to scan your fingerprint for account opening


Benki ni SimBanking

title: CRDB BANK SimBanking

creator: CRDB BANK PLC
descriptionHtml:
Benki ni SimBanking! Our new CRDB Bank SimBanking App gives you full visibility of your accounts and total control over your money. It’s more secure, simpler and faster! Open a fully KYC account, buy insurance, block or apply for TemboCard. Plus, you can make the App personal by selecting exciting features that suit your personal taste and many more features we think you’ll love…

Simple day-to-day banking

• Open a full KYC account
• Ease payments and transfers including bulk payments
• Buy airtime and send money without the selecting the mobile company
• Easier way to withdraw cash from CRDB ATM or Wakala without a TemboCard
• Pay for your shopping and services conveniently through merchant CRDB Lipa Namba
• Get your LUKU token instantly on your App screen

Take control of your money

• Block your TemboCard
• Get insurance or Insurance premium calculator
• Review you monthly, quarterly or annual statement

Single view of your account

• Single view of all your CRDB Bank accounts
• Manage your loans
• Link your accounts

Safer, smarter banking

• Secure login with your PIN
• Ability to scan your fingerprint for account opening

•Upload your favourite photo on your profile

•Schedule recurring transfers and payments daily, weekly and monthly
•SimBanking App registration made simpler and more convenient
•Get alerted on new features
•Arrange screens based on your most preferred services
•Authorise CRDB partners to pay by SimBanking in their Apps

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
In app notification and push notifications - Now, you have the option to receive in-app notifications, having updates, special offers, new product announcements, and more.
Receipt validator - Uncertain about the authenticity of the received receipt? Validate its legitimacy through the receipt validator feature available within Simbanking
UPI Card - One can conveniently execute online transactions using the Virtual Card offered by China UnionPay, a remarkable and efficient solution

appDetails.developerAddress:
CRDB Bank Head Office
Ali Hassan Mwinyi Road P.O Box 268 Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Simbanking Update: Pay Bills Easier and Manage Insurance with CRDB
This update makes it easier than ever to:
• Pay all bills using TAN QR
• You can now register Simbanking anywhere in the world
• Diaspora self account opening
• Diaspora account opening assisted
• Access favorite payments from your one-click dashboard
• Pay CRDB insurance bills with the new CRDB Insurance option
• Redeem Tembo points for other payments
• Bug fixes for GEPG payments

descriptionShort: SimBanking App from CRDB Bank Plc, the Leading Innovative Bank from East Africa.

appDetails.developerAddress:
CRDB Bank Head Office
Ali Hassan Mwinyi Road P.O Box 268 Dar es Salaam, Tanzania
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Hey there, what is new! 🎉
Error Handling: We’re on it! Get clear info on what went wrong with better error messages.
SGR Tickets: Grab your electric train tickets hassle-free.
Credit Card Magic: Top up, view debt, repay, and get detailed statements—your card just got smarter!
Transparent Charges: See all charges as you make transactions. No more surprises!
WhatsApp Banking: Chat with us on WhatsApp for quick and easy banking.
Update now and enjoy these nifty upgrades! 🌟

Credit Card Magic: Top up, view debt, repay, and get detailed statements—your card just got smarter!
Transparent Charges: See all charges as you make transactions. No more surprises!
WhatsApp Banking: Chat with us on WhatsApp for quick and easy banking.
Update now and enjoy these nifty upgrades! 🌟

title:
CRDB BANK SimBanking
14.0.69

container.value:
CRDB Bank Head Office
Ali Hassan Mwinyi Road P.O Box 268 Dar es Salaam, Tanzania

creator: CRDB BANK PLC
descriptionHtml:
Benki ni SimBanking! Our new CRDB Bank SimBanking App gives you full visibility of your accounts and total control over your money. It’s more secure, simpler and faster! Open a fully KYC account, buy insurance, block or apply for TemboCard. Plus, you can make the App personal by selecting exciting features that suit your personal taste and many more features we think you’ll love…

Simple day-to-day banking

• Open a full KYC account
• Ease payments and transfers including bulk payments
• Buy airtime and send money without the selecting the mobile company
• Easier way to withdraw cash from CRDB ATM or Wakala without a TemboCard
• Pay for your shopping and services conveniently through merchant CRDB Lipa Namba
• Get your LUKU token instantly on your App screen

Take control of your money

• Block your TemboCard
• Get insurance or Insurance premium calculator
• Review you monthly, quarterly or annual statement

Single view of your account

• Single view of all your CRDB Bank accounts
• Manage your loans
• Link your accounts

Safer, smarter banking

• Secure login with your PIN
• Ability to scan your fingerprint for account opening
